response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for you at $1,500,000, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price, tailored to reflect its immense worth to you. Our proposal is as follows: $1,200,000. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value for both parties involved. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Let's embark on this journey together towards achieving greater heights.", "product_price": 1200000}
